column5: Cozy apartment above detached garage located just 35 minutes from down town Houston, 45 minutes from the beautiful Gulf of Mexico at high island on Bolivar Peninsula. And only 15 minutes from Baytown. 1 bedroom with 1 private bathroom. Full access to swimming pool and screened area. We do live in the main home and may be present and as well as our children. We will not disturb you during your stay but if we are home you will probably have occasional interactions with our family while outdoors
column8: 35 min from downtown and 15 min from Baytown
